## Table of Contents

## Classes

### <a name="createrepo"></a>`createrepo`

Installs requisite packages and creates the base path under which software
repositories will be created.

#### Examples

##### 

```puppet
class { createrepo:
  repos       => {
    example   => {},
    exampler  => {},
    examplest => {timeout => 400},
  }
}
```

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `createrepo` class:

* [`repos`](#repos)

##### <a name="repos"></a>`repos`

Data type: `Hash`

A hash of repositories to create

Default value: `{}`

### <a name="createrepoparams"></a>`createrepo::params`

This class sets necessary parameters for other classes in the module. Do not include this module directly.

#### Examples

##### 

```puppet
include createrepo::params
```

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `createrepo::params` class:

* [`install_webserver`](#install_webserver)
* [`create_default_vhost`](#create_default_vhost)

##### <a name="install_webserver"></a>`install_webserver`

Data type: `Boolean`

Whether to install httpd automatically along with createrepo.
This will configure repositories under /var/www/html/repos/ by default instead of /var/repos/.

Default value: ``true``

##### <a name="create_default_vhost"></a>`create_default_vhost`

Data type: `Boolean`

Whether or not to create a default vhost for httpd.
This prevents apache serving the first repo when a requested vhost doesn't exist.

Default value: ``true``

## Defined types

### <a name="createreporepo"></a>`createrepo::repo`

Creates and manages local software repositories using createrepo.

#### Examples

##### 

```puppet
createrepo::repo {'example': }

createrepo::repo {'example_b':
  timeout => 500,
}
```

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `createrepo::repo` defined type:

* [`auto_refresh`](#auto_refresh)
* [`refresh_period`](#refresh_period)
* [`timeout`](#timeout)

##### <a name="auto_refresh"></a>`auto_refresh`

Data type: `Boolean`

Whether to refresh the repository automatically using cron.

Default value: ``true``

##### <a name="refresh_period"></a>`refresh_period`

Data type: `String[1]`

The cron time signature for automatically refreshing the repository.
Follows standard cron time format. Defaults to every 5 minutes.

Default value: `'*/5 * * * * *'`

##### <a name="timeout"></a>`timeout`

Data type: `Integer`

Timeout in seconds for createrepo.
Createrepo will continue to attempt repository creation until it hits the timeout, in which case it will error.
Defaults to 5 minutes (300 seconds).

Default value: `300`
